00216 inline float TakeFirst(float* values, uint32 count) { return (count > 0) ? *values : 0.0f; }
00217 
00224 inline float Average(float* values, uint32 count) { float v = 0.0f; for (uint32 i = 0; i < count; ++i) v += values[i]; v /= float(count); return v; }
